Original: 這個地方下午 3 點開門，截至 2018 年 8 月，谷歌有錯誤。水煙可以透過更好的設備、更大的煤鬥部分以及更好的煙草來改進，以獲得更濃的味道，嘗試過甜瓜薄荷，它很淡。特色精選來自Starbuzz，香蕉味道最濃。精釀啤酒的選擇也相當不錯。一定要吃混合小吃，尤其是土耳其無花果和杏子，它們是熱的！一個重要的建議：迫切需要從內到外的通風。

As of August 2018, Google made mistakes.Water smoke can be improved through better equipment, larger coal buckets, and better tobacco to obtain a stronger flavor. It has tried melon mint, which is very light.The features are selected from Starbuzz, and the banana tastes the strongest.The choice of craft beer is also pretty good.Be sure to eat mixed snacks, especially Turkish figs and apricots, they are hot!An important suggestion: urgent ventilation from the inside out.

This place is not very large, I definitely recommend booking in advance.Even so, some people may still feel a little cramped there.Personally, I don't mind, I think this is the charm of this water cigarette bar.This is very relaxed and simple.The staff is very friendly, and they have great discounts/packages.

Original:
如果您曾經在歐洲嘗試過水煙，您會感到失望。這裡的碗比普通碗小兩倍，因此我們不能真正享受吸煙的樂趣。每 15 分鐘就有一次菸草燃燒，我們不得不叫來一位女服務生。蘋果口味是“最好的”，其他的你甚至感覺不到或認不出來。沒什麼，只是煙霧而已。喝完水煙後，我們中的一些人還感到頭痛。
附：我們也很震驚，我們必須多點兩次才可以每人300NTD。我認為這些事情必須事先告知。
EN:
If you have tried water cigarettes in Europe, you will feel disappointed.The bowls here are twice as small as ordinary bowls, so we cannot really enjoy the fun of smoking.Tobacco burns every 15 minutes, and we have to call a female waiter.Apple taste is "the best", and you can't even feel or recognize the others.Nothing, just smoke.After drinking the water smoke, some of us still felt headache.
Attachment: We are also shocked. We must be more time to 300NTD per person.I think these things must be informed in advance.

Original:
那是我們決定去台北吸水煙的第一個地方。坦白說，我只能給 3 顆星，只是因為友善的服務。但最重要的是——水煙真的很糟糕。基本上對於那些不熟悉菸草品種的人來說，我必須提到他們使用最便宜的選擇 - AlFakher。因此，如果您想享受吸煙的過程並選擇一些強烈的煙草，那就別想了。
這個地方並沒有履行其主要功能，所以我有點失望。
EN:
That was the first place we decided to go to Taipei water cigarette.Frankly, I can only give 3 stars, just because of friendly services.But the most important thing is that the water smoke is really bad.Basically, for those who are unfamiliar with tobacco, I must mention that they use the cheapest choice -Alfakher.Therefore, if you want to enjoy the process of smoking and choose some strong tobacco, don't think about it.
This place did not perform its main function, so I was a little disappointed.

Original: 不錯的水菸吧。小，但很舒服。戶外座位。良好的服務和友好的工作人員。土耳其茶很好喝。
EN: Good water cigarette.Small, but very comfortable.Outdoor seats.Good service and friendly staff.Turkish tea is delicious.

EN: A great place ~

EN: This is a great place.Good water cigarette!

EN: A great place!The landlord is very friendly. My Italian friend and I met the landlord. He liked Italy very much because he had been there several times there, and it was absolutely recommended!
